title: [Large-Scale] ADDIE-Q10 Integrated Instructional Design Optimization Course: Blended Learning Application in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and expertise in social sciences domains
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining offline workshops with online tools from the Q10 platform. Most learners are office/administrative workers requiring flexible time management

learning_goals: Designing an educational content production process by systematically mapping the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) to Q10 platform tools
Establishing personalized design strategies for blended education courses in social sciences based on learner data analysis (Q10)

Learners design one educational program applying the ADDIE-Q10 integrated model during a three-week project-based assessment process, analyze pre-post evaluation data (satisfaction ≥80%, learning achievement ≥75%) for effectiveness verification, and propose three or more specific improvement strategies.

resources: Digital collaboration tools (video conferencing, document sharing, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
